Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Lawsuit \Law"suit`\, n. An action at law; a suit in equity or admiralty; any legal proceeding before a court for the enforcement of a claim. [1913 Webster]

lawsuit n : a comprehensive term for any proceeding in a court of law whereby an individual seeks a legal remedy; "the family brought suit against the landlord" [syn: {suit}, {case}, {cause}, {causa}]
